subject: Re: Rsync
body:
Jonathan (ac3bf1) (ac3bf1@gmail.com) wrote on 25 May 2007 17:10:
 >Sorry for the banal question...
 >the debian cd syncing though rsync, does it also delete files if they are
 >not found on the source mirror?

The default behavior or rsync is to not delete; you have to give
--delete explicitly. It could be that the script you use does remove
the old files though.


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
